text: Don Lemon (born March 1, 1966) is an American journalist and author. He is a news anchor for CNN in New York City, and hosts CNN Tonight. He was born in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. Lemon won an Emmy Award for a special report on the real estate market in Chicago. Lemon is openly gay. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American Emmy Award winners Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American journalists Category:American autobiographers Category:American television news anchors Category:CNN people Category:Gay men Category:LGBT journalists Category:LGBT people from Louisiana Category:Journalists from Louisiana Category:Writers from Baton Rouge, Louisiana Category:American LGBT writers
title: Don Lemon
